message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $150 to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it offers great savings compared to its market value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and preferences.
